The most impressive thimg about the blower was its packaging, while opening i had a premium feel. The seals, the plastic bag, especially the red seal on the wire was really impressive. It has makute warranty available but the store does not provide any warranty. Extra bush are also provided. The quality of blower is also good, the price is very reasonable. The only bad or poor quality is the wire cord, it gets a lit bit hot and soft while using it. I would give it 4 star because of it but my overall product experience was really awesome. Overall if its not original makute, it is definitely an A++ copy. I would highly recommend this store.
